languages.text: Subductor's description for character generation screen

traits.locale_text: Subductor's description for character generation screen

languages.text: Щит Арбитес отделяет закон от беззакония, истину от уродливой лжи. До своего возвышения вы состояли в отряде, призванном удерживать толпы бунтующих или не давать сбежать опасным преступникам. Пока в ваших руках щит, вы готовы встретиться лицом к лицу с любой угрозой и отбросить ее обратно за периметр.

The shield of the Adeptus Arbites separates the law from the lawless, and the truth from the detestable lie. Before your ascension, you were part of a squad tasked with keeping crowds from rioting and dangerous criminals from escaping. As long as you have your shield, you are prepared to face any threat and push it back outside the perimeter.
languages.original_text: Щит Арбитес отделяет закон от беззакония, истину от уродливой лжи. До своего возвышения вы состояли в отряде, призванном удерживать толпы бунтующих или не давать сбежать опасным преступникам. Пока в ваших руках щит, вы готовы встретиться лицом к лицу с любой угрозой и отбросить ее обратно за периметр.

traits.locale_text: The shield of the Adeptus Arbites separates the law from the lawless, and the truth from the detestable lie. Before your ascension, you were part of a squad tasked with keeping throngs from rioting and dangerous criminals from escaping. As long as you have your shield, you are prepared to face any threat and push it back outside the perimeter.

As long as you have your shield, you are prepared to face any threat and push it back outside the perimeter.

As long as you have your shield, you are prepared to face any threat and push it back outside the perimeter.

As long as you have your shield, you are prepared to face any threat and push it back outside the perimeter.

Before your ascension, you were part of a squad tasked with keeping crowds from rioting and dangerous criminals from escaping. languages.text: 高等裁定局の盾は、法を無法から切り離し、真実を忌まわしき虚偽から守る。昇格する前、あなたは群衆の暴動を防ぎ、危険な犯罪者の逃亡を阻止する任務を担う部隊の一員だった。盾がある限り、あなたはどんな脅威にも立ち向かい、それを境界の外へと押し戻す覚悟ができている。
languages.original_text: The shield of the Adeptus Arbites separates the law from the lawless, and the truth from the detestable lie. Before your ascension, you were part of a squad tasked with keeping crowds from rioting and dangerous criminals from escaping. As long as you have your shield, you are prepared to face any threat and push it back outside the perimeter.

traits.locale_text: 高等裁定局の盾は、法を無法から切り離し、真実を忌まわしき虚偽から守る。昇格する前、あなたは群衆の暴動を防ぎ、危険な犯罪者の逃亡を阻止する任務を担う部隊の一員だった。盾がある限り、あなたはどんな脅威にも立ち向かい、それを境界の外へと押し戻す覚悟ができている。

languages.text: Der Schild des Adeptus Arbites trennt Gesetz von Gesetzlosen, Wahrheit von schändlicher Lüge. Vor deinem Aufstieg warst du Teil eines Trupps, der Massen vom Rebellieren abhalten sollte und gefährliche Verbrecher von der Flucht. Solange du deinen Schild hast, bist du bereit, jeder Gefahr entgegenzutreten und sie zurückzudrängen.
languages.original_text: The shield of the Adeptus Arbites separates the law from the lawless, and the truth from the detestable lie. Before your ascension, you were part of a squad tasked with keeping crowds from rioting and dangerous criminals from escaping. As long as you have your shield, you are prepared to face any threat and push it back outside the perimeter.

traits.locale_text: Der Schild des Adeptus Arbites trennt Gesetz von Gesetzlosen, Wahrheit von schändlicher Lüge. Vor deinem Aufstieg warst du Teil eines Trupps, der Massen vom Rebellieren abhalten sollte und gefährliche Verbrecher von der Flucht. Solange du deinen Schild hast, bist du bereit, jeder Gefahr entgegenzutreten und sie zurückzudrängen.

languages.text: Le bouclier de l'Adeptus Arbites sépare la loi de l'anarchie et la vérité du détestable mensonge. Avant votre ascension, vous étiez membre d'une escouade chargée de prévenir les émeutes de la populace et l'évasion de dangereux criminels. Tant que vous tenez votre bouclier, vous êtes {mf|prêt|prête} à affronter toutes les menaces pour les chasser du périmètre.
languages.original_text: The shield of the Adeptus Arbites separates the law from the lawless, and the truth from the detestable lie. Before your ascension, you were part of a squad tasked with keeping crowds from rioting and dangerous criminals from escaping. As long as you have your shield, you are prepared to face any threat and push it back outside the perimeter.

traits.locale_text: Le bouclier de l'Adeptus Arbites sépare la loi de l'anarchie et la vérité du détestable mensonge. Avant votre ascension, vous étiez membre d'une escouade chargée de prévenir les émeutes de la populace et l'évasion de dangereux criminels. Tant que vous tenez votre bouclier, vous êtes {mf|prêt|prête} à affronter toutes les menaces pour les chasser du périmètre.

languages.text: El escudo del Adeptus Arbites separa la ley de la anarquía, la verdad de las mentiras más aborrecibles. Antes de tu investidura formabas parte de una unidad encargada de impedir disturbios multitudinarios y fugas de criminales peligrosos. Mientras portes tu escudo, podrás hacer frente a cualquier amenaza y evitar que traspase el perímetro de seguridad.
languages.original_text: The shield of the Adeptus Arbites separates the law from the lawless, and the truth from the detestable lie. Before your ascension, you were part of a squad tasked with keeping crowds from rioting and dangerous criminals from escaping. As long as you have your shield, you are prepared to face any threat and push it back outside the perimeter.

traits.locale_text: El escudo del Adeptus Arbites separa la ley de la anarquía, la verdad de las mentiras más aborrecibles. Antes de tu investidura formabas parte de una unidad encargada de impedir disturbios multitudinarios y fugas de criminales peligrosos. Mientras portes tu escudo, podrás hacer frente a cualquier amenaza y evitar que traspase el perímetro de seguridad.

languages.text: 帝国法务部的防暴盾不仅是隔离律法与违法者的屏障，更是分割真理与谎言的神圣界碑。在获得提拔之前，你曾是镇暴小队的一员，将暴乱于扼杀于萌芽之中，阻止危险的罪犯逃跑。每当你手中握着盾牌时，你就会充满信心面对任何威胁，将混乱与罪恶彻底隔绝在秩序之外。
languages.original_text: The shield of the Adeptus Arbites separates the law from the lawless, and the truth from the detestable lie. Before your ascension, you were part of a squad tasked with keeping crowds from rioting and dangerous criminals from escaping. As long as you have your shield, you are prepared to face any threat and push it back outside the perimeter.

traits.locale_text: 帝国法务部的防暴盾不仅是隔离律法与违法者的屏障，更是分割真理与谎言的神圣界碑。在获得提拔之前，你曾是镇暴小队的一员，将暴乱于扼杀于萌芽之中，阻止危险的罪犯逃跑。每当你手中握着盾牌时，你就会充满信心面对任何威胁，将混乱与罪恶彻底隔绝在秩序之外。

languages.text: Adeptus Arbites'in kalkanı; kanunu kanunsuzdan, hakikati ise iğrenç yalanlardan ayırır. Terfinden önce, kalabalıkların ayaklanmasını ve tehlikeli suçluların firar etmesini önlemekle görevli bir manganın mensubuydun. Kalkanın elinde olduğu müddetçe her türlü tehditle yüzleşmeye ve onları sınır dışına sürmeye hazırsın.
languages.original_text: The shield of the Adeptus Arbites separates the law from the lawless, and the truth from the detestable lie. Before your ascension, you were part of a squad tasked with keeping crowds from rioting and dangerous criminals from escaping. As long as you have your shield, you are prepared to face any threat and push it back outside the perimeter.

traits.locale_text: Adeptus Arbites'in kalkanı; kanunu kanunsuzdan, hakikati ise iğrenç yalanlardan ayırır. Terfinden önce, kalabalıkların ayaklanmasını ve tehlikeli suçluların firar etmesini önlemekle görevli bir manganın mensubuydun. Kalkanın elinde olduğu müddetçe her türlü tehditle yüzleşmeye ve onları sınır dışına sürmeye hazırsın.
